abstract: Southampton, LI, school district officials announce reassignment of Southampton High School assistant principal Esther Adler-O'Keefe; it is unclear if decision to reassign Adler-O'Keefe was related to her appearance in music video with rapper J R, which had generated criticism from district and parents.
lead_paragraph: Esther Adler-O’Keefe has been given other duties in the Southampton, N.Y., school district after appearing in a video by the rapper J.R.

headline.main: Long Island Assistant Principal With Role in Racy Rap Video Is Reassigned
headline.print_headline: Official at L.I. School Is Reassigned After Role in Racy Video

snippet: Esther Adler-O’Keefe has been given other duties in the Southampton, N.Y., school district after appearing in a video by the rapper J.R.
